title: Zen Oasis
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Chinese, Buffet, Salad bar, Asian, Fusion
description: A weekend restaurant in a large bamboo house surrounded by landscaped gardens with capacity for up to 180 diners. Group booking required, available 2-3pm. Offers an extensive buffet spread features a variety of Asian fusion vegetarian and vegan dishes. Has vegetable dishes, fried food, mock meats, soups, salads, sweets and desserts, and fresh cut fresh.
